content.value: Lets talk a bit about this project. Being a full stack developer working on UI with React, I was quite fascinated when I heard about GatsbyJS and how it leverages React to make UI development easy for us using simple configurations and plugins. Finding a source for Gatsby was by far the most difficult thing to do. But thankfully Andrew mead provides an amazing bootcamp free of cost on Youtube where rather than starting from a well designed template it starts with a simple hello world starter and develops on it.

Gatsby has so far raised an interest in me by making it possible to easily use CMS's using some basic plugins so I can also create dynamic websites. Although this is just a simple blog website I created to learn Gatsby, I'm surely planning to dive deeper into it and try even more starters as well as CMS's.
